definition: to form a picture/to develop a photo/to visualize
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
CRT used in TV or computer monitor/picture tube/kinescope

sentences.english: For arteriosus truncus and its branches, ultrasonography detection is not difficult.
sentences.chinese: 主干带小分支型皮瓣轴心动脉超声显像不难。

sentences.english: Observe the flaws immediately after spraying developer, no need to wait for dryness.
sentences.chinese: 喷涂显像剂后，片刻即可观察缺陷，无需等其干燥。

sentences.english: Conclusion Renal scintigraphy is a noninvasive and effective examination in diagnosis of RVH.
sentences.chinese: 结论肾动态显像检查有助于RVH的诊断。

sentences.english: The invention of hyperplane kinescopes is another technical innovation.
sentences.chinese: 显像管的发明是又一次技术革新。

sentences.english: Objective Using dual nuclide renal dynamic imaging to evaluate renal function.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨双核素肾动态显像对肾功能的评价。

sentences.english: Quality control of color picture tubes may require the salvage and reuse of the glass envelopes .
sentences.chinese: 彩色显像管的质量控制需要利用和回用玻璃泡废料。

sentences.english: The new kinescope has a revolving power of 800 lines.
sentences.chinese: 新型显像管有旋转800线圈的功能。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate a novel potential SPECT cerebral blood flow perfusion imaging agent.
sentences.chinese: 目的研制一种新的SPECT脑灌注显像剂。

sentences.english: It is helpful for evaluating the quality of different products to understand those concepts.
sentences.chinese: 掌握这些概念有助于正确评价显像管的质量。

sentences.english: Conclusion Sonography has significant value during of diagnosis of intestinal masses.
sentences.chinese: 结论超声显像对小肠肿物诊断具有重要价值。

sentences.english: The development of 18F labeled hypoxic agents for PET imaging is mainly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 乏氧组织显像剂是当前放射性药物研究的热点之一。

sentences.english: No signals of blood flow was shown the abruption area of placenta by color Doppler flow image.
sentences.chinese: 彩色多普勤血流显像显示胎盘剥离区无血流信号。

sentences.english: The basic mechanisms of imaging agent concentration.
sentences.chinese: 显像剂浓聚的基本原理。

sentences.english: The lymph node mapping(LNM)is a new hot spot of oncology and surgery in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴结显像技术是肿瘤学和外科学研究的新热点。

sentences.english: Objective To study the distinction of the renal dynamic radionuclide imaging in acute upper urinary tract obstruction and their pathological changes.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究急性上尿路梗阻肾核素显像特点及病理改变。

sentences.english: One adrenal metastases were missed by 11 C-choline.
sentences.chinese: 胆碱显像漏检1处肺癌肾上腺转移病灶。
